alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:53PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Isle of Wight, and southeastern Southampton Counties, the City of Franklin and the central City of Suffolk through 545 PM EDT... At 452 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crittenden to near Como. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Smithfield, Windsor, Holland, Suffolk, Kings Fork, Carrsville, Crittenden, Longview, Benns Church, Lummis, Wills Corner, Cleopus, Chuckatuck, Indika, Hobson, Collosse, Sunbeam, Lees Mill and Riverdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
